<h1> Patch 0.8.5

## A new patch has appeared!

# Back-end

- Updated API

- Fixed security issue with reset where you can delete guild data if you aren't an admin.

- Updated Client

# Front-end

- Updated help command.

- Updated buy command

# Other

- Updated auto-updater, it now ACTUALLY refreshed the work command.

- Updated AD.
